page.title: 16Southam Personalities
page.content: Mrs Cardall has a small{museum}in her house. Her late husband was a fireman who collected many items over the years revealing Southam's life in the past. Since the 1960's she has opened her home to groups of interested people, many of whom donate further items. Mr Graham-Jones owns and runs a small {zoo.}He regards his animals as his family and is often seen out with them around the town. Many of them are used in advertising and videos and have become celebrities. At Christmas all the animals are given a present and Joe the old chimp has a cigar and a glass of wine. Birthdays are special occasions too! He has 120 animals, 42 of them are big cats including a{black jaguar which even London Zoo doesn't possess. Holidays are out for Mr Graham-Jones!
